faqs.question: How do I get a free trial?
faqs.answer: Simply click the Free Trial button and you'll be connected to our WhatsApp support for immediate access. We offer both 12-hour and 24-hour free trials.

faqs.question: How easy is it to set up?
faqs.answer: Setup takes just 2-10 minutes depending on your device. We provide detailed guides and 24/7 WhatsApp support to help you get started quickly.

faqs.question: How many devices can I use?
faqs.answer: Standard plan: 1 device, Premium plan: 2 devices, Ultra plan: 4 devices simultaneously.

faqs.question: What if I experience buffering?
faqs.answer: Our anti-buffering technology ensures smooth streaming. If you experience any issues, contact our 24/7 support via WhatsApp.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, contact our support within 7 days for a full refund.

faqs.question: What channels do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer 15,000+ channels including entertainment, sports, movies, news, and international content from around the world.
